extendedInfo.description: The TED TALKS youtube channel is an informative and inspiring source of ideas and discussions on a variety of topics offering free knowledge from some of todayâs greatest thinkers and is enhanced when used in combination with Active Lockscreen, an android app that allows you to attain active screen management, enabling fast and easy launch of any application. Download both TED TALKS and Active Lockscreen to gain control and keep informed of new topics and discussions in the TED TALKS site.  Downloading this application installs TED TALKS directly from the Active Lockscreen application. This requires that you download the Active Lockscreen either before or after downloading TED TALKS. By accessing TED TALKS through Active Lockscreen, you gain immediate and direct access to the TED TALKS Youtube site without having to search for access using your phone. Enjoy TED TALKSâs passionate mission of spreading ideas and become part of the TED TALKS community.   This app will make it so much easier to stay informed and watch inspiring TED TALKS lectures and discussions.  Active Lockscreen replaces your phoneâs lock screen with an active replacement, providing easy launch of any application â ideal when you are on the Go. While your phone is locked, this app displays your favorite gallery pictures and your Facebook feed on your lock screen. You can set up shortcuts to any applications you want and open it with one click. With the Active Lockscreenâs unlimiTED Talks coverage and free of charge app, it is easy to reach anything you need on your phone- reduce clicks to call a contact, launch an app, play a game, browse the web, play music, get Facebook updates or simply unlock your phone. The Active lock screen transforms itself to serve your needs and learns from your actions what you need most. It provides the best app for unlocking your phone.After installation you can do the following directly from your lock screen:â¢ Call your recent contacts or open the dialerâ¢ Launch your recently used apps â¢ Send Text messages through your SMS Inbox or any other text app such as WhatsApp, Skype, Viber, Email, Gmail, Twitter or LinkedIn â¢ Launch the camera or any picture and graphics relaTED Talks apps installed on your phone such as Instagram, Mobli, Food, Adobe photoshop expressâ¢ Define your most common contacts for easy calling even when you are on the go.Downloading Instructions1.	Click Install to download the TED Talks app. 2.	If Active Lockscreen is not yet installed, click OK to enable the Active Lockscreen download.3.	Click Install and proceed to download.After installation, simply launch your recently used apps by placing your finger on the lockscreen ring and dragging it to the relevant action or shortcut.
